name: .XFP
summary: Learn about .XFP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an XFP file with Lucom FormsForWeb (Windows) to view and edit the form it contains.

If you do not have access to FormsForWeb, you can decompress your XFP file with any Zip-decompression utility (such as 7-Zip or WinZip) to view the assets it contains. Before doing so, you may have to rename the file to use the .zip extension (instead of the .xfp extension).
